passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Deals 26 − 43 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (325 range).Hitting an enemy with an immobilizing ability deals 26 − 43 (based on level) (+ 4% bonus health) bonus magic damage and releases a fire nova that also deals that bonus damage to nearby enemies (12 second cooldown).Immolate's damage is increased by 50% against minions and monsters.
